name: Darth Vader Trainer
description:
Player1: Darth Vader moves and turns with mouse, force accelerates with left mouse key. The lightsaber is always behind you.

Player2: Trainer move with Arrow keys, shoot with NumPad 12346789 or ZXCADQWE and go stealth with NumPad 5 or S.

Force jump energy and invisibility will be regenerated overtime.

Press r to restart when each turn ends.
